name: Shooter Future
description:
Shooter Future  is a space themed Shoot 'Em Up where the player can control two spaceships at the same time to try and destroy all of the aliens to get a high score. The player will can either move the ships individually or together to form different formations to shoot from.

 We recommend using a controller for this game. So download the .exe version. This game was made for Global Game Jam 2022! 

Controls:

Player 1:

Move (Ship 1) - WASD or Controller Left Stick

Move (Ship 2) - Left, Right, Up, Down Keys  or Controller Right Stick

Shoot - Spacebar or Controller Trigger/Shoulder Buttons 

Auto Mode (Together Movement) - Enter or Controller Buttons (Any)

Other Credits: 

Sound Effects made from Chiptone: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
